          <title>
            <string language="en">Conservation of momentum in rifle explosions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erhaltung des Momentums in den Gewehrexplosionen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'économie de l'élan fusillent dedans des

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conservation de momentum em explosões do rifle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conservazione di quantità di moto nelle

            <string language="x-mt-el">Συντήρηση της ορμής στις εκρήξεις τουφεκιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conservación del ímpetu en explosiones del 
rifle</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how momentum is conserved during the firing of a rifle.</string>
          </description>

          <description>

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment l'élan est

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como o momentum é

          </description>

          </description>
          <description>
